sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates payload objects for update purchase order action.

Inputs :

  • PSM PO Record- References the PO record.

Outputs :

PO Header - Objects containing below fields:

  • Purchasing Document
  • Company Code
  • Purchasing Doc. Type
  • Deletion indicator
  • Status
  • Created On
  • Created By
  • Item Number Interval
  • Vendor [ VENDOR ]
  • Language Key
  • ISO code for language key
  • Terms of Payment
  • Payment In [ DSCNT1_TO ]
  • Payment In [ DSCNT2_TO ]
  • Payment In [ DSCNT3_TO ]
  • Disc.percent 1
  • Disc.percent 2
  • Purch. Organization
  • Purchasing Group
  • Currency
  • ISO code currency
  • Exchange Rate
  • Exchange Rate Fixed
  • Document Date
  • Validity Per. Start
  • Validity Period End
  • Warranty
  • Quotation
  • Quotation Date
  • Your Reference
  • Salesperson
  • Telephone
  • Supplying Vendor
  • Customer
  • Outline agreement
  • GR Message
  • Supplying Plant
  • Incoterms
  • Incoterms (Part 2)
  • Collective Number
  • Invoicing Party
  • Our Reference
  • Logical System
  • Subitem Interval
  • Release indicator
  • Release State
  • Country sls.tax no.
  • ISO country tax
  • Reason for Canc.
  • Reason Code
  • Retention
  • Retention in Percent
  • Down Payment
  • Down Payment Amt in BAPI
  • Down Payt Percentage
  • Due Date for Down Payment
  • Incomplete
  • Incompleteness
  • Shipping type
  • Handover Location
  • Shipping Conditions
  • Incoterms Version
  • Incoterms Location 1
  • Incoterms Location 2

PO Lines -Objects containing these fields :

  • PO Item Number
  • Deletion indicator
  • Short Text
  • Material [ MATERIAL ]
  • Material Number [ MATERIAL_EXTERNAL ]
  • GUID (External) [ MATERIAL
  • Version Number [ MATERIAL_VERSION ]
  • Material [ EMATERIAL ]
  • Material Number [ EMATERIAL_EXTERNAL ]
  • GUID (External) [ EMATERIAL_GUID ]
  • Version Number [ EMATERIAL_VERSION ]
  • Plant
  • Storage Location
  • Tracking Number
  • Material Group
  • Purchasing info rec.
  • Vendor Material No
  • Order Quantity
  • Order Unit
  • Order unit in ISO
  • Order Price Unit
  • Order price unit ISO
  • Quantity Conversion [ CONV_NUM1 ]
  • Quantity Conversion [ CONV_DEN1 ]
  • Currency amount in BAPI interfaces
  • Price unit
  • GR processing time
  • Tax Code
  • Settlement Group 1
  • Stock Type
  • Info Record Update
  • Print Price
  • Estimated Price
  • 1st Reminder/Exped.
  • 2nd Reminder/Exped.
  • 3rd Reminder/Exped.
  • Overdeliv. Tolerance
  • Unltd Overdelivery
  • Underdel. Tolerance
  • Valuation Type
  • Delivery Completed
  • Final Invoice
  • Item category
  • Acct Assignment Cat.
  • Distribut. indicator
  • Partial invoice
  • Goods receipt
  • Invoice receipt
  • Pricing Date Control
  • Free of Charge
  • GR-Based Inv. Verif.
  • Acknowledgment Reqd
  • Order Acknowledgment
  • Outline agreement
  • Princ.agreement item
  • Shipping Instr.
  • Customer
  • Condition Group
  • No Cash Discount
  • Planned Deliv. Time
  • Net Weight
  • Unit of Weight
  • ISO code
  • Tax Jurisdiction
  • QM Control Key
  • Confirmation Control
  • Revision level

  • Gross Weight
  • Volume
  • Volume Unit
  • Volume unit ISO
  • Incoterms
  • Incoterms (Part 2)

  • Vendor Subrange
  • Higher-Level Item
  • Latest GR Date
  • Vendor [ SUPP_VENDOR ]
  • SC vendor
  • Kanban Indicator
  • Eval. receipt sett.
  • Promotion

  • ISO code
  • Season

  • Min. Rem. Shelf Life
  • RFQ
  • Item [ RFQ_ITEM ]
  • Purchase Requisition
  • Item of requisition
  • Reference Document
  • Reference item
  • Subitem Category
  • Returns Item
  • Alloc.-Tab.-Relevant
  • NCM Code
  • Material usage
  • Material origin
  • Produced in-house
  • Mat. CFOP category
  • Inflation Index
  • Inflation index date
  • Final Delivery
  • Partial Deliv./Item
  • Shipping block
  • Requisitioner
  • Period Ind. for SLED
  • Internal object no.
  • Package number
  • Batch
  • Vendor Batch
  • Pricing type

  • CRM Rf Item No
  • Requirement Urgency

  • Reason Code

  • External Sort Number
  • Ext.Hierarchy Category
  • Retention in Percent
  • Down Payment
  • Down Payment Amt in BAPI
  • Down Payt Percentage
  • Due Date for Down Payment
  • Document No. External Doc.
  • External Item Number
  • Logical System
  • Central Contract
  • Central Contract Item
  • Budget Period
  • Blocking Reason - ID
  • Blocking Reason Text
  • Billing Relevance CRM
  • Fixed Date and Qty
  • GI-based goods rcpt
  • Shipping type
  • Handover Location
  • Tax Code Automatically Determined
  • Manual Tax Code Reason
  • Tax Incentive Type
  • Incentive ID
  • Tax Subject to Substituição Tributária
  • Requirement Segment
  • Stock Segment
  • Origin Jurisd. Code
  • Incoterms Location 1
  • Incoterms Location 2
  • Material [ MATERIAL_LONG ]
  • EMaterial [ EMATERIAL_LONG ]

PO Accounts - Objects containing these fields: 

  • Item
  • Seq. No. of Account Assgt
  • Quantity
  • G/L Account
  • Business Area
  • Cost Center
  • Sales Document
  • Sales Document Item
  • Schedule Line Number
  • Asset
  • Order
  • Controlling Area
  • Cost Object
  • Profit Center
  • WBS element

PO Schedules - List of objects containing these fields:

  • PO Item Number
  • Schedule Line Number
  • Delivery Date Category
  • Delivery Date
  • Scheduled Quantity
  • Time
  • Statistics Relevant Delivery Date
  • Purchase Requisition
  • Item of Purchase Requisition
  • Purchase Order Date
  • Route Schedule
  • Material Availability Date
  • Material Staging Time
  • Loading Date
  • Loading Time
  • Transportation Planning Date
  • Transportation Planning Time
  • Goods Issue Date
  • Goods Issue Time
  • Deletion Indicator
  • Closed
  • Goods Receipt End Date
  • Goods Receipt End Time
  • Committed Quantity
  • Committed date
  • Geographical Route
  • Handover Date
  • Handover Time

PO Address- List of objects containing these fields:

  • PO Item Number
  • Address Number
  • Name
  • C/O Name
  • City
  • District
  • Postal Code
  • PO Box
  • Street
  • Building Code
  • Floor
  • Country Key
  • Region
  • Telephone Number

PO Limits - List of objects containing these fields:

  • Package Number
  • Overall Limit
  • No Limit
  • Expected value
  • Limits Exist for Service Types
  • Limit on Contract Items Exists
  • Limit on Service Packages Exists
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Free Limit
  • No Limit
  • Short Description of Service Type
  • Edition of Service Type
  • Value Limits on Service Types
  • No Limit on Standard Service Type
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Percentage for Price Determination
  • Number of a Set of Model Service Specifications
  • Limits on Model Service Specifications
  • No Limit on Model Specifications
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Percentage for Price Determination [ TMP_PERC ]
  • Percentage for Price Determination [ CONT_PERC ]

PO Services - List of objects containing these fields:

  • Internal Line Number
  • Package Number
  • Line Number
  • Hierarchy Level of Group
  • Outline Level
  • Outline Line Indicator
  • Subpackage Number
  • Activity Number
  • Short Description of Service Type
  • Edition of Service Type
  • Standard Service Catalog Item
  • Vendor's Service Number
  • Quantity with Sign
  • Base Unit of Measure
  • ISO Code for Unit of Measurement
  • Overfulfillment Tolerance
  • Unlimited Overfulfillment
  • Price Unit
  • Gross Price
  • Lower Limit
  • Upper Limit
  • Short Text
  • Distribution Indicator for Multiple Account Assignment
  • Personnel Number
  • Wage Type
  • Source Package Number
  • Entry: Planned Package Line
  • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_PCKG ]
  • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_LINE ]
  • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_PCKG ]
  • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_LINE ]
  • Service Line Refers to Standard Service Catalog Limits
  • Entry: Unplanned, Limit Line
  • Target Value
  • Alternatives: Reference to Basic Item
  • Basic Line
  • Alternative Line
  • Bidder's Line
  • Supplementary Line
  • Line with Open Quantity
  • Informatory Line
  • Blanket Line
  • Contingency Line
  • Tax on Sales/Purchases Code
  • Tax Jurisdiction
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Material Group
  • Date
  • Start Time
  • End Time
  • External Personnel Number
  • Formula Number
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL1 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL2 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL3 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL4 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL5 ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF1_NUM ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF2_NUM ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF1_TXT ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF2_TXT ]
  • Hierarchically Superior Line Number
  • External Reference Key for Service
  • Period of Performance Start Date
  • Period of Performance End Date
  • SRM Reference Key
  • Item Key for eSOA Messages
  • Net Value

PO Service Access  - List of objects containing these fields:

  • Package number
  • Line Number
  • Sequential Number of Account Assignment Specification: Service Line
  • Percentage for Account Assignment Value Distribution
  • Sequential Number of Account Assignment
  • Quantity with Sign
  • Net Value of Item

Action Status - Object containing following fields:

  • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
  • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

Product Documentation | ServiceNow

  • Address Number
  • Name
  • C/O Name
  • City
  • District
  • Postal Code
  • PO Box
  • Street
  • Building Code
  • Floor
  • Country Key
  • Region
  • Telephone Number

PO Limits - List of objects containing these fields:

  • Package Number
  • Overall Limit
  • No Limit
  • Expected value
  • Limits Exist for Service Types
  • Limit on Contract Items Exists
  • Limit on Service Packages Exists
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Free Limit
  • No Limit
  • Short Description of Service Type
  • Edition of Service Type
  • Value Limits on Service Types
  • No Limit on Standard Service Type
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Percentage for Price Determination
  • Number of a Set of Model Service Specifications
  • Limits on Model Service Specifications
  • No Limit on Model Specifications
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Percentage for Price Determination [ TMP_PERC ]
  • Percentage for Price Determination [ CONT_PERC ]

PO Services - List of objects containing these fields:

  • Internal Line Number
  • Package Number
  • Line Number
  • Hierarchy Level of Group
  • Outline Level
  • Outline Line Indicator
  • Subpackage Number
  • Activity Number
  • Short Description of Service Type
  • Edition of Service Type
  • Standard Service Catalog Item
  • Vendor's Service Number
  • Quantity with Sign
  • Base Unit of Measure
  • ISO Code for Unit of Measurement
  • Overfulfillment Tolerance
  • Unlimited Overfulfillment
  • Price Unit
  • Gross Price
  • Lower Limit
  • Upper Limit
  • Short Text
  • Distribution Indicator for Multiple Account Assignment
  • Personnel Number
  • Wage Type
  • Source Package Number
  • Entry: Planned Package Line
  • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_PCKG ]
  • Entry: Unplanned from Contract [ CON_LINE ]
  • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_PCKG ]
  • Entry: Unplanned Service from Model Specifications [ TMP_LINE ]
  • Service Line Refers to Standard Service Catalog Limits
  • Entry: Unplanned, Limit Line
  • Target Value
  • Alternatives: Reference to Basic Item
  • Basic Line
  • Alternative Line
  • Bidder's Line
  • Supplementary Line
  • Line with Open Quantity
  • Informatory Line
  • Blanket Line
  • Contingency Line
  • Tax on Sales/Purchases Code
  • Tax Jurisdiction
  • Price Change in Entry Sheet
  • Material Group
  • Date
  • Start Time
  • End Time
  • External Personnel Number
  • Formula Number
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL1 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL2 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL3 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL4 ]
  • Formula Value [ FORM_VAL5 ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF1_NUM ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF2_NUM ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF1_TXT ]
  • User Defined Field [ USERF2_TXT ]
  • Hierarchically Superior Line Number
  • External Reference Key for Service
  • Period of Performance Start Date
  • Period of Performance End Date
  • SRM Reference Key
  • Item Key for eSOA Messages
  • Net Value

PO Service Access  - List of objects containing these fields:

  • Package number
  • Line Number
  • Sequential Number of Account Assignment Specification: Service Line
  • Percentage for Account Assignment Value Distribution
  • Sequential Number of Account Assignment
  • Quantity with Sign
  • Net Value of Item

Action Status - Object containing following fields:

  • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
  • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
